petri.api
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  petri.api.Button

public class Button
extends java.lang.Object

Graphic representing a clickable area for game control.

Author:
Cody Swendrowski

isClicked

public boolean isClicked()
Returns true if Button was clicked; else, returns false. If it is true, it sets it to false immediately. One-use method.

Returns:
clicked

public static boolean isOneClicked(java.util.List<Button> buts)
A helper method that checks to see if a Button is clicked, given a list of Buttons

buts - List to check
Returns:
True if at least one Button is clicked
